paper_title.en: Hyperon polarization in h-h and h-A collisions and constituent quark-diquark picture

description.en: We discuss the polarization of inclusively produced hyperons in the frame work of constituent quark-diquark cascade model. The leading baryon in the most massive cascade chain determines the spin quantization axis in the reaction. Relating the leading baryon production to the left-right asymmetry of π+ production from polarized proton, we can explain the various experimental data on the hyperon polarizations in hadronic interactions. © 2007 American Institute of Physics.

paper_title.ja: Structure of Extended Loop Wave function in Quantum Gravity and Operator Formalism

paper_title.en: Structure of extended loop wave function in quantum gravity and operator formalism

description.en: The structure of extended loop wave function is investigated in terms of the operator formalism. It is found that the extended loop wave function is characterized by the family number and classified by the partition of the family number. It is pointed out that the constraints to the extended loop function in quantum gravity exhibit a hierarchy structure. © World Scientific Publishing Company.

paper_title.en: Valence quark annihilation and leading charmed meson production in pi N- and K-N collisions

description.en: We discuss the hadroproduction of charmed mesons in the framework of the constituent cascade model taking into account the valence quark annihilation. It is shown that the valence quark annihilation process dominates at large Feymnan x regions and explains the recent experimental data on the asymmetry between D-0 and (D) over bar (0) at 350 GeV/c in pi(-) N collisions.

paper_title.en: Valence quark annihilation and leading charmed meson production in pi N- and K-N collisions

description.en: We discuss the hadroproduction of charmed mesons in the framework of the constituent cascade model taking into account the valence quark annihilation. It is shown that the valence quark annihilation process dominates at large Feymnan x regions and explains the recent experimental data on the asymmetry between D-0 and (D) over bar (0) at 350 GeV/c in pi(-) N collisions.

paper_title.en: Calculation of curvature vacuum correlations in R-gravity

description.en: Under the flat Minkowski space-time background, using the perturbative expansion of the metric density, we calculate the expressions of the leading terms of several two-point curvature vacuum correlation functions in N-dimensional R-gravity, resulting in that the contributions of the leading terms of the curvature vacuum correlation functions are all vanishing.

paper_title.en: Calculation of curvature vacuum correlations in R-gravity

description.en: Under the flat Minkowski space-time background, using the perturbative expansion of the metric density, we calculate the expressions of the leading terms of several two-point curvature vacuum correlation functions in N-dimensional R-gravity, resulting in that the contributions of the leading terms of the curvature vacuum correlation functions are all vanishing.
